headline.main: SARDINIA POUNDED; RAF Bombs Set Fires in Cagliari -- All Planes Return to Bases U.S. FIGHTERS BAG 4 CRAFT Axis Schooner, Hit Off Greek Island, Blocks Channel After She Capsizes SARDINIA POUNDED BY RAF BOMBERS

lead_paragraph: ALLIED HEADQUARTERS IN NORTH AFRICA, July 2 -- RAF Wellingtons again attacked Cagliari, principal port of southern Sardinia, Wednesday night as Allied fliers maintained their bombardment against Sardinia and Sicily.
abstract: Allied fliers down 7 Axis planes during coastal patrols
snippet: ALLIED HEADQUARTERS IN NORTH AFRICA, July 2 -- RAF Wellingtons again attacked Cagliari, principal port of southern Sardinia, Wednesday night as Allied fliers maintained their bombardment against Sardinia and Sicily....

byline.original: By Wireless to THE NEW YORK TIMES
